class.name: Cleric
class.hitpoint_per_level: d8 + CON modifier or 5 + CON modifier

features.name: Spellcasting
features.desc: You know how to cast spells by praying. You can use spells on the cleric spell list

feature_data.name: Cantrips
feature_data.desc: You learn 3 cantrips of your choice from the cleric spell list. This choice can be changed whenever you gain a character level.

feature_data.name: Spell slots
feature_data.desc: You have limited amounts of spell slots. See your cleric's level class features to see how many you're allowed to have

feature_data.name: Prepared spells
feature_data.desc: You prepare a list of spells available to you. See your cleric's level class features to see how many you're allowed to have prepared

feature_data.name: Replacing prepared spells
feature_data.desc: When your character level increases, you can change one spell of your spell list with another one with the correct spell slot

feature_data.name: Spellcasting ability
feature_data.desc: You use WIS as your spellcasting ability

feature_data.name: Spellcasting focus
feature_data.desc: you can use a holy symbol for spellcasting

features.name: Divine order
features.desc: you have dedicated yourself to one of the following holy roles:

feature_data.name: protector
feature_data.desc: You gain proficiency with Martial weapons and are trained for heavy armor

feature_data.name: thaumaturge
feature_data.desc: You gain one extra cantrip from the cleric spell list and a bonus on your arcana and religion checks. this bonus is equal to your WIS modifier

features.name: Channel divinity
features.desc: you can use divine energy to use magical effects. After expending you regain one use after a short rest and all after a long rest. Each time you use channel divinity, you choose which of the following 2 effects:

feature_data.name: divine spark
feature_data.desc: Using a magic action, you point your holy symbol towards a creature within 30ft of you and focus divine energy at it. It either regains an amount of hitpoints equal to 1d8 + CON modifier, or it has to make a CON saving throw, and takes 1d8 + CON modifier of (necrotic or radiant) damage on a fail. on levels 7, 13 and 18 you gain an extra 1d8 to roll with this.

feature_data.name: turn undead
feature_data.desc: Using a magic action, you use your holy symbol on undead creatures. each undead creature of your choice within 30ft of you has to make a WIS saving throw. On fail they will be frightened and incapacitated for 1 minute, and they will try to move away from you every turn this effect is active. ends early if the creature takes damage, when you're incapacitated or when you die.

features.name: Cleric Subclass
features.desc: Gain a subclass for your cleric character

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Sear undead
features.desc: when using turn undead you gain a number of d8's equal to your WIS modifier. roll them and add them together. Each undead has to do a WIS saving throw against this value. on a fail they take radiant damage equal to that value. this damage does not end the effect.

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Blessed strikes
features.desc: you gain one of the following options for your channel divinity

feature_data.name: Divine strike
feature_data.desc: once per turn when hitting a creature with a weapon, you can give the creature an extra 1d8 of necrotic or radiant damage

feature_data.name: Potent spellcasting
feature_data.desc: you can add your WIS modifier to the damage of any cleric cantrip

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Divine intervention
features.desc: Using a magic action, you can choose any cleric spell of lvl 5 and use this spell without expending a spell slot. use this once per long rest

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Improved blessed strikes
features.desc: You get better at blessed strikes

feature_data.name: Divine strike
feature_data.desc: the extra damage increases to 2d8

feature_data.name: Potent spellcasting
feature_data.desc: When casting a cleric cantrip and dealing damage to a creature within 60ft you can give vitality to yourself and one other creature, granting you temporary hit points equal to double your WIS modifier

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Epic boon
features.desc: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat you qualify for.

features.name: Greater divine intervention
features.desc: When using your divine intervention feature, you can choose wish. Roll 2d4 to determine how many long rests you need to do before you can use this feature again.

subclasses.name: Life domain
subclasses.desc: You focus on positive energy and are an expert healer because of it

features.name: Life domain spells
features.desc: you always have certain spells available. you gain additional spells on different levels. see the spells at each level here:

feature_data.name: 3rd
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Aid, Bless, Cure Wounds, Lesser Restoration

feature_data.name: 5th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Mass healing word, Revivivy

feature_data.name: 7th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Aura of life, Death Ward

feature_data.name: 9th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Greater Restoration, Mass Cure Wounds

features.name: Disciple of life
features.desc: When casting a spell with a spell slot restores hit points to a creature, that creature regains an amount of extra hit points equal to 2 + the spell slot level

features.name: Preserve life
features.desc: Using a magic action, you expend a use of channel divinity to restore health in a range of 30ft. The restorable hitpoints equal 5x your cleric class, and can be divided between many creatures within range. creatures can not gain more than half of their hit points

features.name: Blessed healer
features.desc: Healing spells heal you as well. A spell healing another creature will immediately heal 2 + spell slot level hit points on your character

features.name: Supreme Healing
features.desc: you don't have to roll the dice to heal and can instead use the highest number on the dice. 2d6 would be 12 hit points for example

subclasses.name: Light domain
subclasses.desc: this domain is focused on fire

features.name: Light domain spells
features.desc: you always have certain spells available. you gain additional spells on different levels. see the spells at each level here:

feature_data.name: 3rd
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Burning hands, Faerie fire, Scorching ray, See invisibility

feature_data.name: 5th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Daylight, Fireball

feature_data.name: 7th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Arcane eye, wall of fire

feature_data.name: 9th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Flame Strike, Scrying

features.name: Radiance of the dawn
features.desc: Using a magic action, you expend a use of channel divinity to emit light in a range of 30ft of yourself, which stops the darkness from a magical darkness spell. Aditionally you can force creatures of your choice in that area to make a CON saving throw. on a fail the creatures take 2d10 + cleric level of radiant damage. On succes they take half of that damage.

features.name: Warding flare
features.desc: When a creature within 30ft makes an attack roll, you can make a reaction to give that creature disadvantage. You regain uses by doing a long rest and you can use it equal to your WIS modifier

features.name: Improved warding flare
features.desc: You regain all uses after a short rest or a long rest and you can give the target of the triggering attack (so your party member that's being attacked) 2d6 + WIS mod of temporary hit points

features.name: Corona of light
features.desc: Using a magic action, you emit bright light in a range of 60ft and dim light in an additional 30ft (90ft total range) for 1 minute. Enemies within 60ft have disadvantage on saving throws against Radiance of the dawn and any spell that deals fire or radiant damage. per long rest you can use this an amount of times equal to your WIS modifier

subclasses.name: Trickery domain
subclasses.desc: You focus on deceptiion, illusion and stealth

features.name: Trickery domain spells
features.desc: you always have certain spells available. you gain additional spells on different levels. see the spells at each level here:

feature_data.name: 3rd
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Charm person, Disguise self, Invisibility, Pass without trace

feature_data.name: 5th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Hypnotic pattern, Nondetection

feature_data.name: 7th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Confusion, Dimension Door

feature_data.name: 9th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Dominate person, Modify memory

features.name: Blessing of the trickster
features.desc: Using a magic action, you and a creature of choice within 30ft of you can have advantage on DEX checks. this lasts until you do a long rest or until you use this feature again

features.name: Invoke duplicity
features.desc: Using a bonus action, you can expend one channel divinity to make a perfect replication of yourself within a range of 30ft for 1 minute. you gain the following benefits:

feature_data.name: Cast spells
feature_data.desc: The illusion can cast spells as if it's you in the illusions space. you must use your own senses though

feature_data.name: Distract
feature_data.desc: When both you and the illusion are within 5ft of a target you can get advantage on attack rolls for the target

feature_data.name: Move
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action you can move the illusion 30ft to anunoccupied space you can see. this has a max range of 120ft away from you.

features.name: Trickster's transposition
features.desc: when creating or moving your illusion using a bonus action, you can choose to teleport and swap places with your illusion.

features.name: Improved duplicity
features.desc: your duplicity gets more powerful

feature_data.name: Shared distraction
feature_data.desc: Allies making attack rolls against a creature within 5ft of your illusion have advantage

feature_data.name: Healing illusion
feature_data.desc: When your illusion dies you or another creature of choice within 5ft of it regain a number of hit points equal to your cleric level

features.name: War domain spells
features.desc: you always have certain spells available. you gain additional spells on different levels. see the spells at each level here:

feature_data.name: 3rd
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Guiding bolt, Magic weapon, Shield of faith, Spiritual weapon

feature_data.name: 5th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Crusader's mantle, Spirit guardians

feature_data.name: 7th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Fire shield, Freedom of movement

feature_data.name: 9th
feature_data.desc: you have the spells: Hold monster, Steel wind strike

features.name: War priest
features.desc: Using a bonus action, you can make one extra attack with a weapon or an unarmed strike. you can use this an amount of times equal to your WIS modifier and regain all uses after a short or long rest

features.name: Guided strike
features.desc: When you or an ally misses an attack roll you can make a reaction to use one channel divinity to add a +10 bonus to that roll

features.name: War gods blessing
features.desc: You can expend one channel divinity to cast Shield of faith or Spiritual weapon. This way you don't need concentration nor do you have to waste a spell slot, as this uses none. the spell lasts 1 minute instead.

features.name: Avatar of battle
features.desc: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.
